text: Ilocos was a historical province in northern Luzon, Philippines that comprised the present-day provinces of Ilocos Norte, Ilocos Sur, parts of La Union, and Abra. == History == == See also == * Ilocos Norte * Ilocos Sur * Ilocos Region ==References== Category:Ilocano culture Category:Geography of the Philippines Category:Ilocos Region Category:Former provinces of the Philippines la:Regio Ilocana ja:イロコス地方 simple:Ilocos
title: Ilocos (province)
